Introduction

2AM is a four member Korean group that debuted in 2008 under Big Hit Entertainment and JYP Entertainment, and formerly under CUBE Entertainment. In January 2012, they officially debuted in Japan under Sony Music Japan. Currently all the members are under different agencies, but they mentioned several times that 2AM did not disband and that they had clauses in their individual contracts which would allow them to promote as 2AM in the future.
